full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZHI BA'I DRUG CU PA'I GTOR MA BSNGO TSUL 'DUN LDAN RE BA SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES GSHIN RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LA DBYUG GU DRUG CU RTZA BZHI'I GZHI'I GTOR MA PHUL TE ZHI BA'I 'PHRIN LAS BCOL TSUL 'DUN LDAN RE SKONG 'DI NI, RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB BU LHA BTZUN BKA' BCU SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SNGA MO NAS BSKUL ZHING, NYE BAR BSTAN PA'I GSAL MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE AERTE NI BI SHRUL THU MER GEN PAndA TA MKHAN PO NYID NAS, 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BKA' GNANG LTAR ^CHING PI SHRIL THU YOG TZA RYA BAndA TA DZNY'A NA BHA DRAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RE BA'I 'PHRIN LAS BCOL TSUL 'DUN LDAN RE BA SKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYAS PAR KHA SKONG GI SGO NAS ZIN BRIS BDAG GI BLA MA RIN PO CHE 'JAM DPAL RDO RJES SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
